content.raw:
Hi @andy_somerville,

To clarify, BDI controller does not adjust CFM damping parameters dynamically nor change them above [current released limits](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/UserGuide#ROS_Services).  Pull request #248 is there because 1). we do not know what the right damping coefficients should be, and 2). it will make it easier for teams controlling over wire with higher latency (as opposed to BDI's latency free control implementation inside of AtlasPlugin).

Hope that makes sense.
John
